summary.span: 表示應用程式定義域，也就是應用程式執行的獨立環境。

span.span: Represents an application domain, which is an isolated environment where applications execute.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式定義域，由物件，可協助提供隔離、 卸載和安全性界限執行 managed 程式碼。Application domains, which are represented by objects, help provide isolation, unloading, and security boundaries for executing managed code. - 您可以使用應用程式定義域來隔離可能會使處理序的工作。Use application domains to isolate tasks that might bring down a process. 如果狀態，正在執行的工作變得不穩定，即可予以卸載而不會影響此程序。If the state of the that's executing a task becomes unstable, the can be unloaded without affecting the process. 當長時間執行的處理序，必須將它不需要重新啟動時，這很重要。This is important when a process must run for long periods without restarting. 您也可以使用應用程式定義域來隔離不應共用資料的工作。You can also use application domains to isolate tasks that should not share data. - 如果組件載入至預設應用程式定義域時，它不能從記憶體卸載的情況，而處理序正在執行。If an assembly is loaded into the default application domain, it cannot be unloaded from memory while the process is running. 不過，如果您開啟以載入和執行組件的第二個應用程式定義域時，組件會卸載該應用程式定義域卸載時。However, if you open a second application domain to load and execute the assembly, the assembly is unloaded when that application domain is unloaded. 您可以使用這項技巧來減少有時候使用大型的 Dll 的長時間執行處理序的工作集。Use this technique to minimize the working set of long-running processes that occasionally use large DLLs. 多個應用程式定義域可以單一處理序中執行;不過，沒有應用程式定義域和執行緒之間的一對一關聯性。Multiple application domains can run in a single process; however, there is not a one-to-one correlation between application domains and threads. 數個執行緒可以隸屬於單一應用程式網域，而且雖然之給定的執行緒並不侷限於單一應用程式網域，在任何時候，執行緒會執行單一應用程式定義域中。Several threads can belong to a single application domain, and while a given thread is not confined to a single application domain, at any given time, a thread executes in a single application domain. 使用建立應用程式定義域方法。Application domains are created using the method. 執行個體用來載入和執行組件 ()。 instances are used to load and execute assemblies (). 當已不再使用中，它可以卸載。When an is no longer in use, it can be unloaded. 類別會實作一組可讓應用程式在載入組件，應用程式定義域將會卸載，或擲回未處理的例外狀況時回應的事件。The class implements a set of events that enable applications to respond when an assembly is loaded, when an application domain will be unloaded, or when an unhandled exception is thrown. 如需有關如何使用應用程式定義域的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 應用程式定義域](~/docs/framework/app-domains/application-domains.md)。For more information on using application domains, see [Application Domains](~/docs/framework/app-domains/application-domains.md). 這個類別會實作， ，和介面。This class implements the , , and interfaces. 您應該永遠不會建立可遠端處理包裝函式物件。You should never create a remotable wrapper for an object. 如此一來，無法發行的遠端參考，例如公開方法遠端存取並有效地終結該的 程式碼存取安全性。Doing so could publish a remote reference to that , exposing methods such as to remote access and effectively destroying code access security for that . 惡意用戶端連接到遠端無法存取任何資源本身具有存取權。Malicious clients connecting to the remoted could obtain access to any resource the itself has access to. 不會建立可遠端處理的包裝函式延伸任何型別的和實作可能遭到惡意用戶端用來略過安全性系統的方法。Do not create remotable wrappers for any type that extends and that implements methods that could be used by malicious clients to bypass the security system. > [!CAUTION] > 預設值屬性是`false`。The default value for the property is `false`. 此設定是不安全的服務。This setting is unsafe for services. 若要避免服務下載部分信任程式碼，請將此屬性設定為`true`。To prevent services from downloading partially trusted code, set this property to `true`. ## Examples 此範例示範如何建立新，具現化型別中的新，並與該類型的物件。This example shows how to create a new , instantiate a type in that new , and communicate with that type’s object. 此外，此範例示範如何卸載造成要進行記憶體回收的物件。In addition, this example shows how to unload the causing the object to be garbage collected. [!code-cpp[AppDomainX#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomainX/cpp/AppDomainX.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AppDomainX#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomainX/cs/AppDomainX.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppDomainX#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomainX/VB/AppDomainX.vb#1)]

summary.span: 發生於載入組件時。

span.span: Occurs when an assembly is loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 委派這個事件表示哪些組件已載入。The delegate for this event indicates what assembly was loaded. 若要註冊此事件的事件處理常式，您必須擁有必要的權限，或就會擲回。To register an event handler for this event, you must have the required permissions, or a is thrown. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例會示範事件。The following sample demonstrates the event. 若要執行此程式碼範例，您必須提供完整的組件名稱。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 如需如何取得完整組件名稱的資訊，請參閱[組件名稱](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). [!code-cpp[AppDomain_AssemblyLoad#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_AssemblyLoad/CPP/assemblyload.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AppDomain_AssemblyLoad#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_AssemblyLoad/CS/assemblyload.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppDomain_AssemblyLoad#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_AssemblyLoad/VB/assemblyload.vb#1)]

summary.span: 發生於組件解析失敗時。

span.span: Occurs when the resolution of an assembly fails.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 它負責傳回組件中所指定此事件屬性，或傳回 null，如果無法辨識的組件。It is the responsibility of the for this event to return the assembly that is specified by the property, or to return null if the assembly is not recognized. 組件必須載入到執行內容;如果載入僅限反映的內容時，會引發這個事件的負載將會失敗。The assembly must be loaded into an execution context; if it is loaded into the reflection-only context, the load that caused this event to be raised fails. 如需使用這個事件的指引，請參閱 < [ 解析組件載入](~/docs/framework/app-domains/resolve-assembly-loads.md)。For guidance on the use of this event, see [Resolving Assembly Loads](~/docs/framework/app-domains/resolve-assembly-loads.md). 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，則屬性會傳回要求無法解析組件載入的組件。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the property returns the assembly that requested the assembly load that could not be resolved. 例如，載入器可能無法載入要求的組件的相依性，因為要求的組件和其相依性不在探查路徑。For example, the loader might be unable to load a dependency of the requesting assembly because the requesting assembly and its dependency are not in the probing path. 了解要求的組件的識別可能有助於在尋找相依性，或找出正確的版本中，如果使用多個版本的相依性。Knowing the identity of the requesting assembly might be useful in locating the dependency or in identifying the correct version, if more than one version of the dependency is available. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，則所有組件，包括資源組件都會引發事件。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], the event is raised for all assemblies, including resource assemblies. 在舊版中，資源組件不引發事件。In earlier versions, the event was not raised for resource assemblies. 如果當地語系化的作業系統，可能會呼叫處理常式多次： 每個文化特性後援鏈結中的一次。If the operating system is localized, the handler might be called multiple times: once for each culture in the fallback chain. 對於此事件，套用原則之前，屬性會傳回組件名稱。For this event, the property returns the assembly name before policy is applied. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果此事件註冊一個以上的事件處理常式，事件 handlersarecalled，直到事件處理常式的傳回值的順序，不是`null`。If more than one event handler is registered for this event, the event handlersarecalled in order until an event handler returns a value that isn't `null`. 後續的事件處理常式會被忽略。Subsequent event handlers are ignored. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例會示範事件。The following sample demonstrates the event. 若要執行此程式碼範例，您必須提供完整的組件名稱。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 如需如何取得完整組件名稱的資訊，請參閱[組件名稱](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). [!code-cpp[AssemblyResolve#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyResolve/CPP/assemblyresolve.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyResolve#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyResolve/CS/assemblyresolve.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyResolve#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyResolve/VB/assemblyresolve.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法多載會使用從預設應用程式定義域的資訊。This method overload uses the information from the default application domain. 如果`securityInfo`是未提供，會使用目前的應用程式定義域的辨識項。If `securityInfo` is not supplied, the evidence from the current application domain is used. > [!IMPORTANT] > 請勿使用這個方法多載來建立沙箱應用程式定義域。Do not use this method overload to create sandboxed application domains. 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，所提供的辨識項`securityInfo`不會再影響應用程式定義域的授權集。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the evidence that is supplied for `securityInfo` no longer affects the grant set of the application domain. 使用方法多載來建立沙箱應用程式定義域。Use the method overload to create sandboxed application domains. ## Examples 下列範例示範，在一般情況下，如何建立使用其中一種網域多載。The following sample demonstrates, in general, how to create a domain using one of the overloads. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`securityInfo`是未提供，會使用目前的應用程式定義域的辨識項。If `securityInfo` is not supplied, the evidence from the current application domain is used. 如需陰影複製的詳細資訊，請參閱並[陰影複製組件](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md)。For more information about shadow copying, see and [Shadow Copying Assemblies](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md). > [!IMPORTANT] > 請勿使用這個方法多載來建立沙箱應用程式定義域。Do not use this method overload to create sandboxed application domains. 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，所提供的辨識項`securityInfo`不會再影響應用程式定義域的授權集。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the evidence that is supplied for `securityInfo` no longer affects the grant set of the application domain. 使用方法多載來建立沙箱應用程式定義域。Use the method overload to create sandboxed application domains. ## Examples 下列範例示範，在一般情況下，如何建立使用其中一種網域多載。The following sample demonstrates, in general, how to create a domain using one of the overloads. remarks.format: ## Remarks 所表示之方法`adInit`新建立的應用程式定義域的內容中執行。The method represented by `adInit` is executed in the context of the newly created application domain. 如果`securityInfo`是未提供，會使用目前的應用程式定義域的辨識項。If `securityInfo` is not supplied, the evidence from the current application domain is used. 如需陰影複製的詳細資訊，請參閱並[陰影複製組件](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md)。For more information about shadow copying, see and [Shadow Copying Assemblies](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md). > [!IMPORTANT] > 請勿使用這個方法多載來建立沙箱應用程式定義域。Do not use this method overload to create sandboxed application domains. 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，所提供的辨識項`securityInfo`不會再影響應用程式定義域的授權集。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the evidence that is supplied for `securityInfo` no longer affects the grant set of the application domain. 使用方法多載來建立沙箱應用程式定義域。Use the method overload to create sandboxed application domains.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫預設建構函式`typeName`。This method calls the default constructor for `typeName`. 請參閱格式的`assemblyName`。See for the format of `assemblyName`. 嘗試呼叫目標上，不是目前的應用程式定義域的應用程式定義域會導致成功的載入目標應用程式定義域中的組件。An attempt to call on a target application domain that is not the current application domain will result in a successful load of the assembly in the target application domain. 由於不是，當這個方法會嘗試傳回針對至目前的應用程式定義域載入的組件，common language runtime 會嘗試將組件載入目前的應用程式定義域和負載可能會失敗。Since an is not , when this method attempts to return the for the loaded assembly to the current application domain, the common language runtime will try to load the assembly into the current application domain and the load might fail. 載入至目前的應用程式定義域的組件可能不同於已在不同的兩個應用程式定義域的路徑設定是否先載入的組件。The assembly that is loaded into the current application domain might be different from the assembly that was loaded first if the path settings for the two application domains are different.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請參閱格式的`assemblyName`。See for the format of `assemblyName`. 嘗試呼叫目標上，不是目前的應用程式定義域的應用程式定義域會導致成功的載入目標應用程式定義域中的組件。An attempt to call on a target application domain that is not the current application domain will result in a successful load of the assembly in the target application domain. 由於不是，當這個方法會嘗試傳回針對至目前的應用程式定義域載入的組件，common language runtime 會嘗試將組件載入目前的應用程式定義域和負載可能會失敗。Since an is not , when this method attempts to return the for the loaded assembly to the current application domain, the common language runtime will try to load the assembly into the current application domain and the load might fail. 載入至目前的應用程式定義域的組件可能不同於已在不同的兩個應用程式定義域的路徑設定是否先載入的組件。The assembly that is loaded into the current application domain might be different from the assembly that was loaded first if the path settings for the two application domains are different.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是很便利的方法，結合了和。This is a convenience method that combines and . 這個方法會呼叫預設建構函式`typeName`。This method calls the default constructor for `typeName`. 請參閱格式的`assemblyName`。See for the format of `assemblyName`. 請參閱屬性的格式`typeName`。See the property for the format of `typeName`. > [!NOTE] > 若要呼叫的方法的早期繫結`M`類型的物件`T1`所傳回的，方法會進行早期繫結呼叫的型別物件的方法和`T2`組件中`C`以外目前的組件或包含的組件`T1`，組件`C`載入目前的應用程式定義域。If you make an early-bound call to a method `M` of an object of type `T1` that was returned by , and that method makes an early-bound call to a method of an object of type `T2` in an assembly `C` other than the current assembly or the assembly containing `T1`, assembly `C` is loaded into the current application domain. 即使早期繫結呼叫，就會發生此載入`T1.M()`的主體中所做，或是使用其他動態產生的程式碼。This loading occurs even if the early-bound call to `T1.M()` was made in the body of a , or in other dynamically generated code. 如果目前的網域是預設網域，組件`C`程序結束之前無法卸載。If the current domain is the default domain, assembly `C` cannot be unloaded until the process ends. 如果目前的網域稍後嘗試載入組件`C`，負載可能會失敗。If the current domain later attempts to load assembly `C`, the load might fail. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範另一個應用程式定義域中執行程式碼最簡單的方式。The following code example shows the simplest way to execute code in another application domain. 此範例會定義名為類別`Worker`繼承自。The example defines a class named `Worker` that inherits from . `Worker`類別會定義方法，以顯示其執行所在之應用程式定義域的名稱。The `Worker` class defines a method that displays the name of the application domain in which it is executing. 此範例會建立的執行個體`Worker`在預設應用程式定義域和新的應用程式定義域中。The example creates instances of `Worker` in the default application domain and in a new application domain. > [!NOTE] > 包含的組件`Worker`必須載入到兩個應用程式定義域，但它可以載入新的應用程式定義域只存在於其他組件。The assembly that contains `Worker` must be loaded into both application domains, but it can load other assemblies that exist only in the new application domain. [!code-cpp[CreateInstanceAndUnwrap2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CreateInstanceAndUnwrap2/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CreateInstanceAndUnwrap2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CreateInstanceAndUnwrap2/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CreateInstanceAndUnwrap2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CreateInstanceAndUnwrap2/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是很便利的方法，結合了和。This is a convenience method that combines and . 請參閱格式的`assemblyName`。See for the format of `assemblyName`. 請參閱屬性的格式`typeName`。See the property for the format of `typeName`. > [!NOTE] > 若要呼叫的方法的早期繫結`M`類型的物件`T1`所傳回的，方法會進行早期繫結呼叫的型別物件的方法和`T2`組件中`C`以外目前的組件或包含的組件`T1`，組件`C`載入目前的應用程式定義域。If you make an early-bound call to a method `M` of an object of type `T1` that was returned by , and that method makes an early-bound call to a method of an object of type `T2` in an assembly `C` other than the current assembly or the assembly containing `T1`, assembly `C` is loaded into the current application domain. 即使早期繫結呼叫，就會發生此載入`T1.M()`的主體中所做，或是使用其他動態產生的程式碼。This loading occurs even if the early-bound call to `T1.M()` was made in the body of a , or in other dynamically generated code. 如果目前的網域是預設網域，組件`C`程序結束之前無法卸載。If the current domain is the default domain, assembly `C` cannot be unloaded until the process ends. 如果目前的網域稍後嘗試載入組件`C`，負載可能會失敗。If the current domain later attempts to load assembly `C`, the load might fail. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用`ignoreCase`參數。The following sample demonstrates the use of the `ignoreCase` parameter. [!code-cpp[AppDomain_CreateInstance_IgnoreCase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_CreateInstance_IgnoreCase/CPP/ignorecase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AppDomain_CreateInstance_IgnoreCase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_CreateInstance_IgnoreCase/CS/ignorecase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppDomain_CreateInstance_IgnoreCase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_CreateInstance_IgnoreCase/VB/ignorecase.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設建構函式`typeName`叫用。The default constructor for `typeName` is invoked. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 方法。For more information, see the method. 當方法用來建立目標應用程式定義域中，進行呼叫的應用程式定義域以外的執行個體，在目標應用程式定義域中載入的組件時。When the method is used to create an instance in a target application domain, other than the application domain from which the call is made, the assembly is loaded in the target application domain. 不過，如果呼叫的應用程式定義域中執行個體未包裝，以特定方式使用的未包裝的執行個體可能會導致要載入至呼叫的應用程式定義域的組件。However, if the instance is unwrapped in the calling application domain, using the unwrapped instance in certain ways can cause the assembly to be loaded into the calling application domain. 例如，未包裝的執行個體之後，可能會要求其型別資訊，以便呼叫其方法晚期繫結。For example, after the instance is unwrapped, its type information might be requested, in order to call its methods late-bound. 當組件載入至呼叫的應用程式定義域時，可能會發生例外狀況。When the assembly is loaded into the calling application domain, exceptions can occur. - 如果另一個版本相同的組件的先前已載入至呼叫的應用程式定義域中，或如果呼叫的應用程式定義域的載入路徑為不同的目標應用程式定義域，例外狀況可能會發生。If another version of the same assembly was previously loaded into the calling application domain, or if the load path of the calling application domain is different from that of the target application domain, exceptions such as can occur. - 如果呼叫的應用程式定義域呼叫早期繫結執行個體的型別，嘗試轉型執行個體時，可能會擲回。If the calling application domain makes early-bound calls to the instance type, can be thrown when an attempt is made to cast the instance. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法多載來建立目標應用程式定義域中的物件的執行個體，並呼叫其方法。The following example shows how to use the method overload to create an instance of an object in a target application domain and call its methods. 此範例會定義`MarshallableExample`類別，可以跨應用程式定義域界限封送處理。The example defines the `MarshallableExample` class, which can be marshaled across application domain boundaries. 範例會建置目前執行的組件的路徑、 建立目標應用程式定義域，並使用方法多載來載入目標應用程式定義域中的範例組件和建立的執行個體`MarshallableExample`。The example builds a path to the currently executing assembly, creates a target application domain, and uses the method overload to load the example assembly into the target application domain and create an instance of `MarshallableExample`. > [!NOTE] > 路徑是在此範例中，絕對路徑，但相對路徑也可以運作，因為方法用來載入組件。The path is absolute in this example, but a relative path would also work because the method is used to load the assembly. 如果之後解除包裝的物件控制代碼，此範例會示範三種方式可使用目標應用程式定義域中的物件：After unwrapping the object handle, the example demonstrates three ways to use an object in a target application domain: - 叫用方法，以使用反映的晚期繫結。Invoking a method with late binding, using reflection. 這需要型別資訊，這會導致要載入至呼叫端的應用程式定義域的組件。This requires type information, which causes the assembly to be loaded into the application domain of the caller. （在此範例中，已經載入也是。）(In this example, it is already loaded.) - 呼叫端和被呼叫端知道介面將物件轉型。Casting the object to an interface known to both the caller and the callee. 如果呼叫的組件或呼叫端和被呼叫端所參考的第三個組件中定義的介面，則呼叫的組件不載入至呼叫端的應用程式定義域。If the interface is defined in the calling assembly or in a third assembly referenced by both the caller and the callee, the called assembly is not loaded into the application domain of the caller. - 直接呼叫端知道它的型別時，請使用物件。Using the object directly when its type is known to the caller. 組件必須載入到呼叫端的應用程式定義域。The assembly must be loaded into the application domain of the caller. 若要避免被呼叫的組件載入至呼叫端的應用程式定義域的另一個方法是呼叫者是衍生自類別，以及定義可以在目標應用程式定義域中執行的方法。Another way to avoid loading the called assembly into the application domain of the caller is for the caller to derive from the class and to define a method that can be run in the target application domain. 該方法可以使用反映來檢查目標組件，因為目標組件已載入至目標應用程式定義域。That method can use reflection to examine a target assembly, because the target assembly is already loaded into the target application domain. 範例，請參閱屬性。See the example for the property. [!code-cpp[System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceFrom_StringString#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.createinstancefrom_stringstring/cpp/example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceFrom_StringString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.createinstancefrom_stringstring/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceFrom_StringString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.createinstancefrom_stringstring/vb/example.vb#1)]

span.span: Culture-specific information that governs the coercion of args to the formal types declared for the typeName constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關這個方法的詳細資訊，請參閱方法。For more information about this method, see the method. 當方法用來建立目標應用程式定義域中，進行呼叫的應用程式定義域以外的執行個體，在目標應用程式定義域中載入的組件時。When the method is used to create an instance in a target application domain, other than the application domain from which the call is made, the assembly is loaded in the target application domain. 不過，如果呼叫的應用程式定義域中執行個體未包裝，以特定方式使用的未包裝的執行個體可能會導致要載入至呼叫的應用程式定義域的組件。However, if the instance is unwrapped in the calling application domain, using the unwrapped instance in certain ways can cause the assembly to be loaded into the calling application domain. 例如，未包裝的執行個體之後，可能會要求其型別資訊，以便呼叫其方法晚期繫結。For example, after the instance is unwrapped, its type information might be requested, in order to call its methods late-bound. 當組件載入至呼叫的應用程式定義域時，可能會發生例外狀況。When the assembly is loaded into the calling application domain, exceptions can occur. - 如果另一個版本相同的組件的先前已載入至呼叫的應用程式定義域中，或如果呼叫的應用程式定義域的載入路徑為不同的目標應用程式定義域，例外狀況可能會發生。If another version of the same assembly was previously loaded into the calling application domain, or if the load path of the calling application domain is different from that of the target application domain, exceptions such as can occur. - 如果呼叫的應用程式定義域呼叫早期繫結執行個體的型別，嘗試轉型執行個體時，可能會擲回。If the calling application domain makes early-bound calls to the instance type, can be thrown when an attempt is made to cast the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法應該只用來定義動態組件中目前的應用程式定義域。This method should only be used to define a dynamic assembly in the current application domain. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱方法多載。For more information, see the method overload. > [!NOTE] > 在開發期間會發出動態組件的程式碼，建議您使用的多載方法所指定的辨識項和權限，提供您想要並將包含的動態組件的辨識項中`refusedPermissions`.During the development of code that emits dynamic assemblies, it is recommended that you use an overload of the method that specifies evidence and permissions, supply the evidence you want the dynamic assembly to have, and include in `refusedPermissions`. 包括在`refusedPermissions`參數可確保會驗證 MSIL。Including in the `refusedPermissions` parameter ensures that the MSIL is verified. 這項技術的限制是，它也會使要求完全信任的程式碼搭配使用時擲回。A limitation of this technique is that it also causes to be thrown when used with code that demands full trust. ## Examples 下列範例會示範方法和事件。The following sample demonstrates the method and event. 若要執行此程式碼範例，您必須提供完整的組件名稱。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 如需如何取得完整組件名稱的資訊，請參閱[組件名稱](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). [!code-cpp[AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly/CPP/definedynamicassembly.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly/CS/definedynamicassembly.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly/VB/definedynamicassembly.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法多載來指定將無法正常運作除非建立動態組件時，它們會套用的屬性。Use this method overload to specify attributes that do not work correctly unless they are applied when a dynamic assembly is created. 比方說，安全性屬性這類和無法正常運作如果在建立動態組件之後，它們會加入。For example, security attributes such as and do not work correctly if they are added after a dynamic assembly has been created. 這個方法應只用來定義動態組件中目前的應用程式定義域。This method should be used only to define a dynamic assembly in the current application domain. 如需有關這項限制的詳細資訊，請參閱方法多載。For more information about this restriction, see the method overload. 中引進這個方法多載[!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]。This method overload is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立動態組件具有。The following code sample shows how to create a dynamic assembly that has the . 屬性必須指定為陣列的項目物件。The attribute must be specified as an element of an array of objects. 建立第一個步驟是取得屬性的建構函式。The first step in creating the is to obtain a constructor for the attribute. 建構函式沒有任何參數，因此方法呼叫的空陣列物件，以表示參數的類型。The constructor has no parameters, so the method is called with an empty array of objects to represent the types of the parameters. 第二個步驟是將產生物件的建構函式類別，以及類型的空陣列來表示引數。The second step is to pass the resulting object to the constructor for the class, together with an empty array of type to represent the arguments. 產生接著會傳遞給做為唯一的項目陣列的方法。The resulting is then passed to the method as the only element of an array. 範例程式碼定義的模組，然後輸入新的動態組件，並接著會顯示組件的屬性。The example code defines a module and a type in the new dynamic assembly, and then displays the assembly's attributes. [!code-cpp[DefineDynamicAssemblyWithAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DefineDynamicAssemblyWithAttributes/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DefineDynamicAssemblyWithAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DefineDynamicAssemblyWithAttributes/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DefineDynamicAssemblyWithAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/DefineDynamicAssemblyWithAttributes/vb/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用指定的名稱、存取模式和辨識項來定義動態組件。

returns.span: 使用指定名稱和功能的動態組件。

span.span: A dynamic assembly with the specified name and features.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有完全受信任的呼叫端可以提供他們`evidence`定義動態時。Only fully trusted callers can supply their `evidence` when defining a dynamic . 執行階段會將對應透過安全性原則，以判斷授與的權限。The runtime will map the through the security policy to determine the granted permissions. 部分信任的呼叫端必須提供 null `evidence`。Partially trusted callers must supply a null `evidence`. 如果`evidence`已`null`，執行階段會將複製的權限集合，也就是目前授與和拒絕呼叫端的集至動態所定義，並標示為已解決的原則。If `evidence` is `null`, the runtime copies the permission sets, that is, the current grant and deny sets, from the caller's to the dynamic being defined and marks policy as resolved. 如果動態是儲存至磁碟，後續的載入將會取得位置相關聯的原則為基礎的授與其中已儲存。If the dynamic is saved to disk, subsequent loads will get grants based on policies associated with the location where the was saved. 這個方法應該只用來定義動態組件中目前的應用程式定義域。This method should only be used to define a dynamic assembly in the current application domain. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱方法多載。For more information, see the method overload. > [!NOTE] > 在開發期間會發出動態組件的程式碼，建議您使用的多載方法所指定的辨識項和權限，提供您想要並將包含的動態組件的辨識項中`refusedPermissions`.During the development of code that emits dynamic assemblies, it is recommended that you use an overload of the method that specifies evidence and permissions, supply the evidence you want the dynamic assembly to have, and include in `refusedPermissions`. 包括在`refusedPermissions`參數可確保會驗證 MSIL。Including in the `refusedPermissions` parameter ensures that the MSIL is verified. 這項技術的限制是，它也會使要求完全信任的程式碼搭配使用時擲回。A limitation of this technique is that it also causes to be thrown when used with code that demands full trust. ## Examples 下列範例會示範方法和事件。The following sample demonstrates the method and the event. 首先，程式碼範例會嘗試建立的執行個體`MyDynamicType`藉由呼叫方法具有無效的組件名稱，並攔截產生的例外狀況。First, the code example tries to create an instance of `MyDynamicType` by calling the method with an invalid assembly name, and catches the resulting exception. 程式碼範例接著會新增事件處理常式事件，然後再次嘗試建立的執行個體`MyDynamicType`。The code example then adds an event handler for the event, and again tries to create an instance of`MyDynamicType`. 在呼叫期間，則無效的組件都會引發事件。During the call to , the event is raised for the invalid assembly. 事件處理常式會建立動態組件，其中包含名為的型別`MyDynamicType`、 提供的類型的無參數建構函式，並傳回新的動態組件。The event handler creates a dynamic assembly that contains a type named `MyDynamicType`, gives the type a parameterless constructor, and returns the new dynamic assembly. 在呼叫成功，然後完成的建構函式和`MyDynamicType`在主控台上顯示一則訊息。The call to then finishes successfully, and the constructor for `MyDynamicType` displays a message at the console. [!code-cpp[AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly/CPP/definedynamicassembly.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly/CS/definedynamicassembly.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly/VB/definedynamicassembly.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法應該只用來定義動態組件中目前的應用程式定義域。This method should only be used to define a dynamic assembly in the current application domain. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱方法多載。For more information, see the method overload. > [!NOTE] > 在開發期間會發出動態組件的程式碼，建議您使用的多載方法所指定的辨識項和權限，提供您想要並將包含的動態組件的辨識項中`refusedPermissions`.During the development of code that emits dynamic assemblies, it is recommended that you use an overload of the method that specifies evidence and permissions, supply the evidence you want the dynamic assembly to have, and include in `refusedPermissions`. 包括在`refusedPermissions`參數可確保會驗證 MSIL。Including in the `refusedPermissions` parameter ensures that the MSIL is verified. 這項技術的限制是，它也會使要求完全信任的程式碼搭配使用時擲回。A limitation of this technique is that it also causes to be thrown when used with code that demands full trust. ## Examples 下列範例會示範方法和事件。The following sample demonstrates the method and event. 若要執行此程式碼範例，您必須提供完整的組件名稱。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 如需如何取得完整組件名稱的資訊，請參閱[組件名稱](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). summary.span: 使用指定的名稱、存取模式、儲存目錄和辨識項來定義動態組件。

returns.span: 使用指定名稱和功能的動態組件。

span.span: A dynamic assembly with the specified name and features.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有完全受信任的呼叫端可以提供他們`evidence`定義動態時。Only fully trusted callers can supply their `evidence` when defining a dynamic . 執行階段會將對應透過安全性原則，以判斷授與的權限。The runtime will map the through the security policy to determine the granted permissions. 部分信任的呼叫端必須提供 null `evidence`。Partially trusted callers must supply a null `evidence`. 如果`evidence`已`null`，執行階段會將複製的權限集合，也就是目前授與和拒絕呼叫端的集至動態所定義，並標示為已解決的原則。If `evidence` is `null`, the runtime copies the permission sets, that is, the current grant and deny sets, from the caller's to the dynamic being defined and marks policy as resolved. 如果動態是儲存至磁碟，後續的載入將會取得位置相關聯的原則為基礎的授與其中已儲存。If the dynamic is saved to disk, subsequent loads will get grants based on policies associated with the location where the was saved. 這個方法應該只用來定義動態組件中目前的應用程式定義域。This method should only be used to define a dynamic assembly in the current application domain. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱方法多載。For more information, see the method overload. > [!NOTE] > 在開發期間會發出動態組件的程式碼，建議您使用的多載方法所指定的辨識項和權限，提供您想要並將包含的動態組件的辨識項中`refusedPermissions`.During the development of code that emits dynamic assemblies, it is recommended that you use an overload of the method that specifies evidence and permissions, supply the evidence you want the dynamic assembly to have, and include in `refusedPermissions`. 包括在`refusedPermissions`參數可確保會驗證 MSIL。Including in the `refusedPermissions` parameter ensures that the MSIL is verified. 這項技術的限制是，它也會使要求完全信任的程式碼搭配使用時擲回。A limitation of this technique is that it also causes to be thrown when used with code that demands full trust. ## Examples 下列範例會示範方法和事件。The following sample demonstrates the method and event. 若要執行此程式碼範例，您必須提供完整的組件名稱。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 如需如何取得完整組件名稱的資訊，請參閱[組件名稱](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). [!code-cpp[AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly/CPP/definedynamicassembly.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly/CS/definedynamicassembly.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly/VB/definedynamicassembly.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 針對指定的權限要求`requiredPermissions`， `optionalPermissions`，和`refusedPermissions`不會使用，除非已儲存並重新載入到記憶體的動態組件。The permission requests specified for `requiredPermissions`, `optionalPermissions`, and `refusedPermissions` are not used unless the dynamic assembly has been saved and reloaded into memory. 若要指定不會儲存到磁碟，請使用的多載的暫時性組件的權限要求方法，也會為要求的權限，並提供為指定的辨識項物件。To specify permission requests for a transient assembly that is never saved to disk, use an overload of the method that specifies evidence as well as requested permissions, and supply an object. > [!NOTE] > 在開發期間會發出動態組件的程式碼，建議您使用的多載方法所指定的辨識項和權限，提供您想要並將包含的動態組件的辨識項中`refusedPermissions`.During the development of code that emits dynamic assemblies, it is recommended that you use an overload of the method that specifies evidence and permissions, supply the evidence you want the dynamic assembly to have, and include in `refusedPermissions`. 包括在`refusedPermissions`參數可確保會驗證 MSIL。Including in the `refusedPermissions` parameter ensures that the MSIL is verified. 這項技術的限制是，它也會使要求完全信任的程式碼搭配使用時擲回。A limitation of this technique is that it also causes to be thrown when used with code that demands full trust. 這個方法應該只用來定義動態組件中目前的應用程式定義域。This method should only be used to define a dynamic assembly in the current application domain. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱方法多載。For more information, see the method overload . ## Examples 下列範例會示範方法和事件。The following sample demonstrates the method and event. 若要執行此程式碼範例，您必須提供完整的組件名稱。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 如需如何取得完整組件名稱的資訊，請參閱[組件名稱](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 針對指定的權限要求`requiredPermissions`， `optionalPermissions`，並`refusedPermissions`才會使用`evidence`也提供，或如果儲存動態組件，而且重新載入到記憶體。The permission requests specified for `requiredPermissions`, `optionalPermissions`, and `refusedPermissions` are used only if `evidence` is also supplied, or if the dynamic assembly is saved and reloaded into memory. > [!NOTE] > 在開發期間會發出動態組件的程式碼，建議您包含在`refusedPermissions`。During the development of code that emits dynamic assemblies, it is recommended that you include in `refusedPermissions`. 包括在`refusedPermissions`參數可確保會驗證 MSIL。Including in the `refusedPermissions` parameter ensures that the MSIL is verified. 這項技術的限制是，它也會使要求完全信任的程式碼搭配使用時擲回。A limitation of this technique is that it also causes to be thrown when used with code that demands full trust. 只有完全受信任的呼叫端可以提供他們`evidence`定義動態時。Only fully trusted callers can supply their `evidence` when defining a dynamic . 執行階段會將對應透過安全性原則，以判斷授與的權限。The runtime will map the through the security policy to determine the granted permissions. 部分信任的呼叫端必須提供 null `evidence`。Partially trusted callers must supply a null `evidence`. 如果`evidence`已`null`，執行階段會將複製的權限集合，也就是目前授與和拒絕呼叫端的集至動態所定義，並標示為已解決的原則。If `evidence` is `null`, the runtime copies the permission sets, that is, the current grant and deny sets, from the caller's to the dynamic being defined and marks policy as resolved. 如果動態是儲存至磁碟，後續的載入將會取得位置相關聯的原則為基礎的授與其中已儲存。If the dynamic is saved to disk, subsequent loads will get grants based on policies associated with the location where the was saved. 這個方法應該只用來定義動態組件中目前的應用程式定義域。This method should only be used to define a dynamic assembly in the current application domain. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱方法多載。For more information, see the method overload. ## Examples 下列範例會示範方法和事件。The following sample demonstrates the method and event. 若要執行此程式碼範例，您必須提供完整的組件名稱。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 如需如何取得完整組件名稱的資訊，請參閱[組件名稱](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 針對指定的權限要求`requiredPermissions`， `optionalPermissions`，和`refusedPermissions`不會使用，除非已儲存並重新載入到記憶體的動態組件。The permission requests specified for `requiredPermissions`, `optionalPermissions`, and `refusedPermissions` are not used unless the dynamic assembly has been saved and reloaded into memory. 若要指定不會儲存到磁碟，請使用的多載的暫時性組件的權限要求方法，也會為要求的權限，並提供為指定的辨識項物件。To specify permission requests for a transient assembly that is never saved to disk, use an overload of the method that specifies evidence as well as requested permissions, and supply an object. > [!NOTE] > 在開發期間會發出動態組件的程式碼，建議您使用的多載方法所指定的辨識項和權限，提供您想要並將包含的動態組件的辨識項中`refusedPermissions`.During the development of code that emits dynamic assemblies, it is recommended that you use an overload of the method that specifies evidence and permissions, supply the evidence you want the dynamic assembly to have, and include in `refusedPermissions`. 包括在`refusedPermissions`參數可確保會驗證 MSIL。Including in the `refusedPermissions` parameter ensures that the MSIL is verified. 這項技術的限制是，它也會使要求完全信任的程式碼搭配使用時擲回。A limitation of this technique is that it also causes to be thrown when used with code that demands full trust. 這個方法應該只用來定義動態組件中目前的應用程式定義域。This method should only be used to define a dynamic assembly in the current application domain. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱方法多載。For more information, see the method overload. ## Examples 下列範例會示範方法和事件。The following sample demonstrates the method and event. 若要執行此程式碼範例，您必須提供完整的組件名稱。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 如需如何取得完整組件名稱的資訊，請參閱[組件名稱](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). summary.span: 使用指定的名稱、存取模式、儲存目錄、辨識項、權限要求、同步選項及自訂屬性來定義動態組件。

span.span: A dynamic assembly with the specified name and features.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法多載來指定將無法正常運作除非建立動態組件時，它們會套用的屬性。Use this method overload to specify attributes that do not work correctly unless they are applied when a dynamic assembly is created. 比方說，安全性屬性這類和無法正常運作如果在建立動態組件之後，它們會加入。For example, security attributes such as and do not work correctly if they are added after a dynamic assembly has been created. 針對指定的權限要求`requiredPermissions`， `optionalPermissions`，並`refusedPermissions`才會使用的參數`evidence`也提供參數，或如果儲存動態組件，而且重新載入到記憶體。The permission requests specified for the `requiredPermissions`, `optionalPermissions`, and `refusedPermissions` parameters are used only if the `evidence` parameter is also supplied, or if the dynamic assembly is saved and reloaded into memory. > [!NOTE] > 當您開發可發出動態組件的程式碼時，我們建議您包含加上旗標在`refusedPermissions`參數。When you develop code that emits dynamic assemblies, we recommend that you include the flag in the `refusedPermissions` parameter. 此旗標包含確保的 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 會進行驗證。The inclusion of this flag ensures that the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) will be verified. 這項技術會偵測到意外產生無法驗證的程式碼，否則這是非常難以偵測。This technique will detect the unintentional generation of unverifiable code, which otherwise is very difficult to detect. 這項技術的限制是，它也會使要求完全信任的程式碼搭配使用時擲回。A limitation of this technique is that it also causes to be thrown when it is used with code that demands full trust. 只有完全受信任的呼叫端可以提供辨識項，當定義動態。Only fully trusted callers can supply evidence when defining a dynamic . 執行階段對應透過安全性原則，以判斷授與的權限。The runtime maps the through the security policy to determine the granted permissions. 部分信任的呼叫端必須提供`null`針對`evidence`參數。Partially trusted callers must supply `null` for the `evidence` parameter. 如果`evidence`是`null`，執行階段將 （也就是，目前的授與和拒絕集） 的權限集合從呼叫者的組件複製到的動態組件所定義，且標示為已解決的原則。If `evidence` is `null`, the runtime copies the permission sets (that is, the current grant and deny sets) from the caller's assembly to the dynamic assembly that is being defined, and marks the policy as resolved. 如果動態組件會儲存至磁碟，則後續載入會根據儲存動態組件的位置與相關聯的原則授與。If the dynamic assembly is saved to disk, subsequent loads will get grants based on policies that are associated with the location where the dynamic assembly was saved. 如果`isSynchronized`是`true`，下列方法產生將會同步處理： ， ， ， ， ，和。If `isSynchronized` is `true`, the following methods of the resulting will be synchronized: , , , , , and . 其中兩種方法會呼叫不同的執行緒上，如果其中一個會封鎖直到另完成為止。If two of these methods are called on different threads, one will block until the other is completed. 中引進這個方法多載[!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]。This method overload is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)].

span.span: An object that represents the domain manager provided by the host when the application domain was initialized, or if no domain manager was provided.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 受管理的主機，common language runtime (CLR) 可以提供網域管理員。An unmanaged host of the common language runtime (CLR) can provide a domain manager. 可以初始化新的應用程式定義域中參與的定義域管理員，並將其提供其他管理員中，例如，參與的應用程式定義域的作業。The domain manager can participate in initializing the new application domain and supply other managers, such as a , that participate in the operations of the application domain.

summary.span: 發生於將要卸載 時。

span.span: Occurs when an is about to be unloaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 委派為這個事件可以在應用程式網域卸載之前執行任何終止活動。The delegate for this event can perform any termination activities before the application domain is unloaded. 每個應用程式定義域必須執行處理卸載時應該註冊這個事件的事件處理常式。Each application domain that needs to perform processing when it is unloaded should register an event handler for this event. 共用的事件處理常式應該不使用，因為委派不會識別正在卸載的網域。A shared event handler should not be used, because the delegate does not identify the domain that is being unloaded. > [!NOTE] > 預設應用程式定義域中永遠不會引發這個事件。This event is never raised in the default application domain. 請勿在執行緒引發事件的相關假設。Do not make assumptions about the thread the event is raised on. 可以在不同的執行緒以外的呼叫引發事件方法。The event can be raised on a different thread than the one that called the method. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

summary.span: 取得組件解析程式用來探查動態建立之組件的目錄。

span.span: Gets the directory that the assembly resolver uses to probe for dynamically created assemblies.

value.span: 組件解析程式用來探查以動態建立組件的目錄。

span.span: The directory that the assembly resolver uses to probe for dynamically created assemblies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要設定的動態的目錄，將指定的基底目錄路徑屬性會用以建立新的應用程式定義域的物件。To set the dynamic directory, assign a base directory path to the property of the object that will be used to create the new application domain. 修改指派給屬性的基底目錄路徑的簡單名稱是指派給字串的雜湊程式碼子目錄屬性，所以基底目錄格式*原始路徑* \\*雜湊碼*。The base directory path you assign to the property is modified by the addition of a subdirectory whose simple name is the hash code of the string you assign to the property, so the format of the base directory is *original path*\\*hash code*. 此基底目錄的子目錄動態的目錄。The dynamic directory is a subdirectory of this base directory. 其簡單的名稱是值屬性，因此它的格式*原始路徑*\\*雜湊碼*\\*應用程式名稱*。Its simple name is the value of the property, so its format is *original path*\\*hash code*\\*application name*. ## Examples 下列範例與目錄的應用程式定義域建立動態組件的、 發出動態組件和將它儲存在動態的目錄中，將組件載入新的應用程式定義域然後使用它。The following example creates an application domain with a directory for dynamic assemblies, emits a dynamic assembly and stores it in the dynamic directory, and then loads the assembly into the new application domain and uses it. 此範例會建立物件以及設定其"Example"的屬性並將其"C:\DynamicAssemblyDir"的屬性。The example creates an object and sets its property to "Example" and its property to "C:\DynamicAssemblyDir". 此範例接著會顯示屬性，以顯示應用程式名稱的雜湊碼，已附加為原本指派路徑的子目錄。The example then displays the property, to show that the hash code of the application name has been appended as a subdirectory of the path that was originally assigned. > [!NOTE] > 在此範例中的基底目錄就是要探查路徑外部的範例應用程式。The base directory in this example is intended to be outside the probing path for the example application. 請務必在編譯中的不同位置的範例。Be sure to compile the example in a different location. 刪除的基底目錄及其所有子目錄每次執行此範例的資訊。Delete the base directory and all its subdirectories each time you run the example. 此範例會建立新的應用程式定義域中，使用物件。The example creates a new application domain, using the object. 此範例會使用屬性，以擷取目錄的名稱，因此它可以建立該目錄。The example uses the property to retrieve the name of the directory, so it can create the directory. （此範例可以輕鬆地建立目錄事先藉由串連的原始路徑，應用程式名稱，而應用程式名稱的雜湊碼。）(The example could just as easily create the directory beforehand by concatenating the original path, the hash code of the application name, and the application name.) 此範例包含 `GenerateDynamicAssembly`方法，會發出名為組件`DynamicHelloWorld.dll`並將它儲存在新的應用程式定義域的動態目錄中。The example has a `GenerateDynamicAssembly` method that emits an assembly named `DynamicHelloWorld.dll` and stores it in the new application domain's dynamic directory. 動態組件包含一種類型， `HelloWorld`，，有一個靜態方法 (`Shared`方法，在 Visual Basic 中的) 名為`HelloFromAD`。The dynamic assembly contains one type, `HelloWorld`, that has a static method (`Shared` method in Visual Basic) named `HelloFromAD`. 呼叫這個方法會顯示應用程式定義域的名稱。Calling this method displays the name of the application domain. `Example`類別衍生自，因此範例可以建立類別的執行個體，在新的應用程式定義域，並呼叫其`Test`方法。The `Example` class derives from , so the example can create an instance of the class in the new application domain and call its `Test` method. `Test`方法會依其顯示名稱載入的動態組件，並呼叫靜態`HelloFromAD`方法。The `Test` method loads the dynamic assembly by its display name and calls the static `HelloFromAD` method. 您可以顯示的動態目錄搜尋一般探查路徑之後，撰寫程式碼組件名為`DynamicHelloWorld.dll`和編譯此範例中的相同目錄中。You can show that the dynamic directory is searched after the normal probing paths by writing code for an assembly named `DynamicHelloWorld.dll` and compiling it in the same directory as this example. 組件必須具有一個名為類別`HelloWorld`靜態方法，名為`HelloFromAD`。The assembly must have a class named `HelloWorld` with a static method named `HelloFromAD`. 這個方法不需要有相同的功能與在範例中，它只可以在主控台中顯示的字串。This method does not have to have the same functionality as the one in the example; it can simply display a string to the console. 組件也必須將它的版本設定為 1.0.0.0 的屬性。The assembly must also have an attribute that sets its version to 1.0.0.0. 當您執行範例時，才能動態的目錄中搜尋找到您編譯目前目錄中的組件。When you run the example, the assembly you compiled in the current directory is found before the dynamic directory is searched. [!code-cpp[ADDynamicBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADDynamicBase/CPP/addynamicbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ADDynamicBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADDynamicBase/CS/addynamicbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ADDynamicBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADDynamicBase/VB/addynamicbase.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 組件會開始執行的.NET Framework 標頭中指定的進入點。The assembly begins executing at the entry point specified in the .NET Framework header. 這個方法不會建立新的處理序或應用程式定義域，並不會在新的執行緒上執行的進入點方法。This method does not create a new process or application domain, and it does not execute the entry point method on a new thread. 這個方法會載入組件使用方法。This method loads assemblies using the method. 您也可以執行使用的組件方法，載入組件使用方法。You can also execute assemblies using the method, which loads assemblies using the method. 若要建立載入並執行，請使用方法。To create the to load and execute, use the method. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用其中一個多載的上兩個不同的網域。The following sample demonstrates using one of the overloads of on two different domains. [!code-cpp[AppDomain_ExecuteAssembly#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_ExecuteAssembly/CPP/executeassembly.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AppDomain_ExecuteAssembly#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_ExecuteAssembly/CS/executeassembly.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppDomain_ExecuteAssembly#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_ExecuteAssembly/VB/executeassembly.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會提供類似的功能方法，但指定的組件的顯示名稱或而不是檔案的位置。The method provides similar functionality to the method, but specifies the assembly by display name or rather than by file location. 因此，載入的組件方法，而非方法。Therefore, loads assemblies with the method rather than with the method. 組件會開始執行的.NET Framework 標頭中指定的進入點。The assembly begins executing at the entry point specified in the .NET Framework header. 這個方法不會建立新的處理序或應用程式定義域，並不會在新的執行緒上執行的進入點方法。This method does not create a new process or application domain, and it does not execute the entry point method on a new thread.

MemberSignature.Value: public event EventHandler<System.Runtime.ExceptionServices.FirstChanceExceptionEventArgs> FirstChanceException;
.event class System.EventHandler`1<class System.Runtime.ExceptionServices.FirstChanceExceptionEventArgs> FirstChanceException
Public Custom Event FirstChanceException As EventHandler(Of FirstChanceExceptionEventArgs)
public: event EventHandler<System::Runtime::ExceptionServices::FirstChanceExceptionEventArgs ^> ^ FirstChanceException;
member this.FirstChanceException : EventHandler<System.Runtime.ExceptionServices.FirstChanceExceptionEventArgs>

summary.span: 發生於執行階段在呼叫堆疊中搜尋應用程式定義域的例外狀況處理常式之前，在 Managed 程式碼中擲回例外狀況時。

span.span: Occurs when an exception is thrown in managed code, before the runtime searches the call stack for an exception handler in the application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件是只有通知。This event is only a notification. 處理這個事件不會處理例外狀況或會影響後續的例外狀況以任何方式處理。Handling this event does not handle the exception or affect subsequent exception handling in any way. 在引發事件，並已叫用事件處理常式之後，common language runtime (CLR) 會開始搜尋例外狀況處理常式。After the event has been raised and event handlers have been invoked, the common language runtime (CLR) begins to search for a handler for the exception. 第一個有機會檢查任何 managed 例外狀況可讓應用程式定義域。 provides the application domain with a first chance to examine any managed exception. 每個應用程式網域，就可以處理事件。The event can be handled per application domain. 如果執行緒會透過多個應用程式定義域傳遞執行呼叫時，CLR 可讓您開始搜尋應用程式定義域中相符的例外狀況處理常式之前，已註冊的事件處理常式中，每個應用程式定義域中引發事件。If a thread passes through multiple application domains while executing a call, the event is raised in each application domain that has registered an event handler, before the CLR begins searching for a matching exception handler in that application domain. 在處理事件之後，搜尋會將相符的例外狀況處理常式，該應用程式定義域中。After the event has been handled, a search is made for a matching exception handler in that application domain. 如果找不到，就會在下一步 的應用程式定義域引發事件。If none is found, the event is raised in the next application domain. 您必須處理所有例外狀況發生在事件處理常式事件。You must handle all exceptions that occur in the event handler for the event. 否則，是遞迴引發。Otherwise, is raised recursively. 這可能會導致堆疊溢位和應用程式終止。This could result in a stack overflow and termination of the application. 我們建議您為限制的執行區域 (Cer)，實作此事件的事件處理常式，以防止基礎結構相關例外狀況，例如記憶體不足或堆疊溢位例外狀況通知時，會影響虛擬機器正在處理中。We recommend that you implement event handlers for this event as constrained execution regions (CERs), to keep infrastructure-related exceptions such as out-of-memory or stack overflow from affecting the virtual machine while the exception notification is being processed. 此事件不會引發例外狀況，表示損毀的程序的狀態，例如存取違規，除非事件處理常式上為安全性關鍵，而且有屬性。This event is not raised for exceptions that indicate corruption of process state, such as access violations, unless the event handler is security-critical and has the attribute. 正在處理此通知事件時，common language runtime 會暫止執行緒中止。The common language runtime suspends thread aborts while this notification event is being handled. ## Examples 下列範例會建立一系列具名的應用程式定義域`AD0`經由`AD3`，使用`Worker`每個應用程式定義域中的物件。The following example creates a series of application domains named `AD0` through `AD3`, with a `Worker` object in each application domain. 每個`Worker`物件具有的參考`Worker`物件在下一步 的應用程式網域中，除了`Worker`最後一個應用程式定義域中。Each `Worker` object has a reference to the `Worker` object in the next application domain, except for the `Worker` in the last application domain. 以外的所有應用程式定義域中處理事件`AD1`。The event is handled in all application domains except `AD1`. > [!NOTE] > 除了此範例中，示範多個應用程式定義域中的第一個可能的例外狀況通知，您可以找到簡單使用案例[如何： 接收 First-chance 例外狀況通知](~/docs/framework/app-domains/how-to-receive-first-chance-exception-notifications.md)。In addition to this example, which demonstrates first-chance exception notifications in multiple application domains, you can find simple use cases in [How to: Receive First-Chance Exception Notifications](~/docs/framework/app-domains/how-to-receive-first-chance-exception-notifications.md). 預設應用程式定義域時已建立的應用程式定義域，呼叫`TestException`第一個應用程式定義域的方法。When the application domains have been created, the default application domain calls the `TestException` method for the first application domain. 每個`Worker`物件會呼叫`TestException`方法下, 一步 的應用程式定義域，直到最後一個`Worker`會擲回例外狀況處理或未處理的。Each `Worker` object calls the `TestException` method for the next application domain, until the last `Worker` throws an exception that is either handled or unhandled. 因此，目前的執行緒通過所有的應用程式定義域中，和`TestException`新增到每個應用程式定義域中的堆疊。Thus, the current thread passes through all the application domains, and `TestException` is added to the stack in each application domain. 當上次`Worker`物件會處理例外狀況，只有在最後一個應用程式定義域引發事件。When the last `Worker` object handles the exception, the event is raised only in the last application domain. 其他的應用程式定義域永遠不會有機會處理例外狀況，因此不會引發事件。The other application domains never get a chance to handle the exception, so the event is not raised. 當上次`Worker`物件不會處理例外狀況，每個應用程式在網域中，事件處理常式就會引發事件。When the last `Worker` object does not handle the exception, the event is raised in each application domain that has an event handler. 每個事件處理常式已完成之後，堆疊會繼續回溯直到預設應用程式定義域所捕捉的例外狀況。After each event handler has finished, the stack continues to unwind until the exception is caught by the default application domain. > [!NOTE] > 若要查看如何堆疊顯示隨著接近引發事件，並使其更接近預設應用程式定義域，變更`e.Exception.Message`要`e.Exception`在`FirstChanceHandler`事件處理常式。To see how the stack display grows as the event is raised closer and closer to the default application domain, change `e.Exception.Message` to `e.Exception` in the `FirstChanceHandler` event handlers. 請注意，當`TestException`稱為跨應用程式定義域界限，它會出現兩次： 一次的 proxy，一次虛設常式。Notice that when `TestException` is called across application domain boundaries, it appears twice: once for the proxy and once for the stub. [!code-csharp[System.AppDomain.FirstChanceException#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.firstchanceexception/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.AppDomain.FirstChanceException#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.firstchanceexception/vb/example.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設應用程式定義域的易記名稱是可執行檔的程序的檔案名稱。The friendly name of the default application domain is the file name of the process executable. 例如，用來啟動處理程序的可執行檔是否`"c:\MyAppDirectory\MyAssembly.exe"`，預設應用程式定義域的易記名稱是`"MyAssembly.exe"`。For example, if the executable used to start the process is `"c:\MyAppDirectory\MyAssembly.exe"`, the friendly name of the default application domain is `"MyAssembly.exe"`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用屬性來取得目前的應用程式定義域的易記名稱。The following code example uses the property to get the friendly name of the current application domain. 預設應用程式定義域的易記名稱會是應用程式的可執行檔的名稱。For the default application domain, the friendly name is the name of the application's executable file. 在程式碼範例也會顯示應用程式定義域的其他資訊。The code example also displays additional information about the application domain. remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用這個方法來擷取值的描述屬性的這個執行個體的名稱資料組的內部快取中的項目。Use this method to retrieve the value of an entry in an internal cache of name-data pairs that describe properties of this instance of . 請注意，比較`name`索引鍵 / 值組的名稱會區分大小寫。Note that the comparison of `name` with the name of key-value pairs is case-sensitive. 快取會自動包含預先定義的系統建立應用程式定義域時，會插入的項目。The cache automatically contains predefined system entries that are inserted when the application domain is created. 您可以查看其值與方法或對等項目屬性。You can inspect their values with the method, or the equivalent properties. 您可以插入或修改您自己的使用者定義名稱資料組，而且方法，並檢查其值與方法。You can insert or modify your own user defined name-data pairs with the method and inspect their values with the method. 下表描述`name`每個預先定義的系統項目和其對應屬性。The following table describes the `name` of each predefined system entry and its corresponding property. |'Name' 的值Value of 'name'|屬性Property| |---------------------|--------------| |「 APPBASE""APPBASE"|| |"APP_CONFIG_FILE""APP_CONFIG_FILE"|| |「 APP_LAUNCH_URL""APP_LAUNCH_URL"|（沒有內容）(no property)

「 APP_LAUNCH_URL"表示原先要求的使用者之前任何重新導向, 的 URL。"APP_LAUNCH_URL" represents the URL originally requested by the user, before any redirection. 它位於已啟動應用程式，例如 Internet Explorer 的瀏覽器時，才。It is available only when the application has been launched with a browser such as Internet Explorer. 並非所有瀏覽器提供此值。Not all browsers provide this value.| |「 APP_NAME""APP_NAME"|| |「 BINPATH_PROBE_ONLY""BINPATH_PROBE_ONLY"|| |「 CACHE_BASE""CACHE_BASE"|| |「 CODE_DOWNLOAD_DISABLED""CODE_DOWNLOAD_DISABLED"|| |「 DEV_PATH""DEV_PATH"|（沒有內容）(no property)| |「 DISALLOW_APP""DISALLOW_APP"|| |"DISALLOW_APP_BASE_PROBING""DISALLOW_APP_BASE_PROBING"|| |「 DISALLOW_APP_REDIRECTS""DISALLOW_APP_REDIRECTS"|| |"DYNAMIC_BASE""DYNAMIC_BASE"|| |「 FORCE_CACHE_INSTALL""FORCE_CACHE_INSTALL"|| |「 LICENSE_FILE"或特定應用程式的字串"LICENSE_FILE", or an application-specific string|| |「 LOADER_OPTIMIZATION""LOADER_OPTIMIZATION"|| |「 LOCATION_URI""LOCATION_URI"|（沒有內容）(no property)| |「 PRIVATE_BINPATH""PRIVATE_BINPATH"|| |"REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT""REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT"|

「 REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT"不是系統項目和它的值可以藉由呼叫設定方法。"REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT" is not a system entry, and its value can be set by calling the method.| |"SHADOW_COPY_DIRS""SHADOW_COPY_DIRS"|| ## Examples 下列範例會建立新的應用程式定義域、 設定的網域中，系統提供值，並將新的值組的網域。The following example creates a new application domain, sets a system-provided value for the domain, and adds a new value pair for the domain. 下列範例示範如何使用方法來擷取這些值組中的資料，並對主控台顯示它們。The example then demonstrates how to use the method to retrieve the data from these value pairs and display them to the console. [!code-cpp[ADGetData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADGetData/CPP/adgetdata.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ADGetData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADGetData/CS/adgetdata.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ADGetData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADGetData/VB/adgetdata.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會測試是否已指定相容性參數設定為目前的應用程式定義域。This method tests whether the specified compatibility switch has been set for the current application domain. 相容性參數通常還原行為 （例如排序方式字串） 的.NET framework 版本之間已變更。Compatibility switches typically restore a behavior (such as the way strings are sorted) that was changed between versions of the .NET Framework. 它們由呼叫設定方法，然後再建立應用程式定義域。They are set by calling the method before creating an application domain. 下表提供可以設定以還原舊版的.NET framework 的行為的相容性參數的範例。The following table provides examples of compatibility switches that can be set to restore the behavior of earlier versions of the .NET Framework. |參數Switch|意義Meaning| |------------|-------------| |"NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy""NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy"|程式碼存取安全性 (CAS)[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]啟用此應用程式定義域中。Code access security (CAS) for the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] is enabled in this application domain. 請參閱[ <NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy>項目](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element.md)。See [<NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element.md).| |"NetFx40_Legacy20SortingBehavior""NetFx40_Legacy20SortingBehavior"|排序的預設值的字串[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]這個應用程式定義域中已啟用。String sorting defaults for the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] are enabled in this application domain. 它的成功需要 sort00001000.dll 安裝。Its success requires sort00001000.dll to be installed. 請參閱[ <CompatSortNLSVersion>項目](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/compatsortnlsversion-element.md)。See [<CompatSortNLSVersion> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/compatsortnlsversion-element.md).| |"NetFx40_Legacy40SortingBehavior""NetFx40_Legacy40SortingBehavior"|排序的預設值的字串[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]和 Unicode 5.0 會啟用此應用程式定義域中。String sorting defaults for the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]and Unicode 5.0 are enabled in this application domain. 它的成功需要 sort00060101.dll 安裝。Its success requires sort00060101.dll to be installed.| |"NetFx40_TimeSpanLegacyFormatMode""NetFx40_TimeSpanLegacyFormatMode"| 格式化行為的[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]啟用此應用程式定義域中。 formatting behavior for the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] is enabled in this application domain. 請參閱[ <TimeSpan_LegacyFormatMode>項目](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/timespan-legacyformatmode-element.md)和 「 還原舊版 TimeSpan 格式化 」 一節的主題。See [<TimeSpan_LegacyFormatMode> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/timespan-legacyformatmode-element.md) and the "Restoring Legacy TimeSpan Formatting" section of the topic.| |"UseRandomizedStringHashAlgorithm""UseRandomizedStringHashAlgorithm"|執行階段計算字串的雜湊碼在每個應用程式定義域為基準，而不是使用單一的雜湊演算法可跨應用程式定義域產生一致雜湊碼。The runtime calculates hash codes for strings on a per application domain basis instead of using a single hashing algorithm that produces a consistent hash code across application domains. 請參閱[ <UseRandomizedStringHashAlgorithm>項目](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/userandomizedstringhashalgorithm-element.md)。See [<UseRandomizedStringHashAlgorithm> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/userandomizedstringhashalgorithm-element.md).|

summary.span: 傳回值，指出應用程式定義域是否為該處理程序的預設應用程式定義域。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether the application domain is the default application domain for the process.

returns.span: 如果目前的 物件代表處理程序的預設應用程式定義域，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the current object represents the default application domain for the process; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個受管理的程序具有預設應用程式定義域。Every managed process has a default application domain. 在 預設網域，開始執行。Execution begins in the default domain. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立第二個應用程式定義域，並顯示相關的預設網域和新的網域資訊。The following code example creates a second application domain and displays information about the default domain and the new domain. [!code-cpp[System.AppDomain.IsDefaultAppDomain#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.AppDomain.IsDefaultAppDomain/CPP/System.AppDomain.IsDefaultAppDomain.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.AppDomain.IsDefaultAppDomain#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.AppDomain.IsDefaultAppDomain/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.AppDomain.IsDefaultAppDomain#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.AppDomain.IsDefaultAppDomain/VB/source.vb#1)]

Public Function IsFinalizingForUnload () As Boolean
public: bool IsFinalizingForUnload();
member this.IsFinalizingForUnload : unit -> bool

summary.span: 指示這個應用程式定義域是否正在卸載，以及其包含的物件是否正在由 Common Language Runtime 進行最終處理。

span.span: Indicates whether this application domain is unloading, and the objects it contains are being finalized by the common language runtime.

returns.span: 如果這個應用程式定義域正在卸載且 Common Language Runtime 已開始叫用完成項，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if this application domain is unloading and the common language runtime has started invoking finalizers; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件的最終處理方法會提供物件的記憶體回收之前執行任何必要的清除作業的機會。The finalization method for an object provides you an opportunity to perform any necessary cleanup operations before the object is garbage collected. 在最終處理之後, 此物件會為可存取，但處於無效狀態，因此無法使用。After finalization, the object is accessible but in an invalid state and therefore unusable. 最後，記憶體回收完成，並回收物件。Eventually, garbage collection completes and reclaims the object. 在下列情況的其中一個呼叫物件的完成項方法： 記憶體回收期間，當正在關閉通用語言執行平台，或包含物件的應用程式定義域卸載時。An object's finalization method is called in one of the following situations: during garbage collection, when the common language runtime is shutting down, or when the application domain that contains the object is unloaded. 方法會傳回`true`只有在最後一個案例中; 它不會傳回`true`當最終處理的結果從例行回收或 CLR 關閉。The method returns `true` only in the last case; it does not return `true` if finalization results from routine garbage collection or from CLR shutdown. > [!NOTE] > 若要判斷是否因為 CLR 關閉，所以最終處理，請使用屬性。To determine whether finalization is due to CLR shutdown, use the property. 它會傳回`true`最終處理是否因為應用程式定義域正在卸載或 clr 正在關閉。It returns `true` if finalization is due to an application domain being unloaded or to the CLR shutting down. 同時在您完成的方法執行期間定義域卸載，您可能想要存取靜態欄位所參考，且具有最終處理方法的另一個物件。While executing in your finalization method during domain unloading, you might want to access another object that is referenced by a static field and has a finalization method. 不過，您無法可靠地執行，因為存取的物件可能會有已經結束。However, you cannot reliably do so because the accessed object might already have been finalized. > [!NOTE] > 此規則的例外是類別，其中包含參考資料流物件的靜態欄位，但您可以一律，即使在網域卸載或系統關機期間寫入系統主控台中，因此，特別實作。An exception to this rule is the class, which contains static fields that reference stream objects, but is implemented specially so you can always write to the system console, even during domain unloading or system shutdown. 物件的完成項方法中使用這個方法，以判斷是否包含物件的應用程式定義域正在卸載。Use this method in an object's finalization method to determine whether the application domain that contains the object is unloading. 如果是這樣，您無法可靠地存取具有完成項方法，並且由靜態欄位參考的任何物件。If that is the case, you cannot reliably access any object that has a finalization method and is referenced by a static field.

summary.span: 取得值，該值指出載入目前應用程式定義域中的組件是否在完全信任情況下執行。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether assemblies that are loaded into the current application domain execute with full trust.

span.span: if assemblies that are loaded into the current application domain execute with full trust; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法永遠傳回`true`桌面上執行的應用程式的預設應用程式定義域。This method always returns `true` for the default application domain of an application that runs on the desktop. 它會傳回`false`，利用所建立的沙箱化應用程式網域方法多載，除非應用程式定義域授與的權限相當於完全信任。It returns `false` for a sandboxed application domain that was created by using the method overload, unless the permissions that are granted to the application domain are equivalent to full trust. ## Examples 下列範例示範屬性和與完全信任和部分信任的應用程式定義域的屬性。The following example demonstrates the property and the property with fully trusted and partially trusted application domains. 應用程式的預設應用程式定義域為完全受信任的應用程式網域。The fully trusted application domain is the default application domain for the application. 部分信任的應用程式定義域由使用方法多載。The partially trusted application domain is created by using the method overload. 此範例會使用`Worker`類別衍生自，因此它可以封送處理跨應用程式定義域界限。The example uses a `Worker` class that derives from , so it can be marshaled across application domain boundaries. 此範例會建立`Worker`預設應用程式定義域中的物件。The example creates a `Worker` object in the default application domain. 然後它會呼叫`TestIsFullyTrusted`方法，以顯示屬性值，應用程式定義域並載入至應用程式定義域的兩個組件： mscorlib，這是.NET Framework 和範例組件的一部分。It then calls the `TestIsFullyTrusted` method to display the property value for the application domain and for two assemblies that are loaded into the application domain: mscorlib, which is part of the .NET Framework, and the example assembly. 這兩個組件是完全受信任，所以完全信任，應用程式定義域。The application domain is fully trusted, so both assemblies are fully trusted. 此範例會建立另一個`Worker`物件在沙箱應用程式定義域，然後再次呼叫`TestIsFullyTrusted`方法。The example creates another `Worker` object in a sandboxed application domain and again calls the `TestIsFullyTrusted` method. Mscorlib 永遠是受信任，甚至是在部分信任的應用程式網域中，但是範例組件是以部分信任。Mscorlib is always trusted, even in a partially trusted application domain, but the example assembly is partially trusted. [!code-csharp[System.AppDomain.IsFullyTrusted#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.isfullytrusted/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.AppDomain.IsFullyTrusted#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.isfullytrusted/vb/example.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示目前應用程式定義域是否會授與一組權限給所有載入該應用程式定義域中的組件。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the current application domain has a set of permissions that is granted to all assemblies that are loaded into the application domain.

value.span: 如果目前應用程式定義域具有一組同質性權限，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the current application domain has a homogenous set of permissions; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會傳回`true`使用所建立的沙箱化應用程式定義域方法多載。This property returns `true` for sandboxed application domains that were created by using the method overload. 沙箱應用程式定義域具有一組同質性權限;也就是相同的權限集授與載入應用程式定義域的所有部分信任組件。Sandboxed application domains have a homogenous set of permissions; that is, the same set of permissions is granted to all partially trusted assemblies that are loaded into the application domain. （選擇性） 沙箱應用程式定義域會有免套用此權限集，並改為使用完全信任執行的強式名稱組件清單。A sandboxed application domain optionally has a list of strong-named assemblies that are exempt from this permission set, and instead run with full trust. 完全受信任的程式碼可以使用屬性來判斷沙箱應用程式定義域的同質性的授權集。Fully trusted code can use the property to determine the homogenous grant set of a sandboxed application domain. 這個屬性也會傳回`true`預設應用程式定義域的桌面應用程式，因為該應用程式定義域會完全信任授與所有組件。This property also returns `true` for the default application domain of a desktop application, because that application domain grants full trust to all assemblies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 開頭為[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，使用這個方法載入的組件的信任層級是應用程式定義域的信任層級相同。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the trust level of an assembly that is loaded by using this method is the same as the trust level of the application domain. 這個方法應只將組件載入目前的應用程式定義域。This method should be used only to load an assembly into the current application domain. 為了方便起見提供這個方法的互通性的呼叫端無法呼叫靜態方法。This method is provided as a convenience for interoperability callers who cannot call the static method. 若要將其他應用程式定義域的組件載入，使用方法例如。To load assemblies into other application domains, use a method such as . 通用於所有多載，這個方法的資訊，請參閱方法多載。For information that is common to all overloads of this method, see the method overload. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何載入原始的組件的使用。The following sample demonstrates the use of loading a raw assembly. 若要執行此程式碼範例，您必須提供完整的組件名稱。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 如需如何取得完整組件名稱的資訊，請參閱[組件名稱](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). [!code-cpp[AppDomain_LoadRaw#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_LoadRaw/CPP/loadraw.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AppDomain_LoadRaw#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_LoadRaw/CS/loadraw.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppDomain_LoadRaw#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_LoadRaw/VB/loadraw.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法應只將組件載入目前的應用程式定義域。This method should be used only to load an assembly into the current application domain. 為了方便起見提供這個方法的互通性的呼叫端無法呼叫靜態方法。This method is provided as a convenience for interoperability callers who cannot call the static method. 若要將其他應用程式定義域的組件載入，使用方法例如。To load assemblies into other application domains, use a method such as . 如果尚未載入要求的組件的版本，這個方法會傳回載入的組件，即使要求不同的版本。If a version of the requested assembly is already loaded, this method returns the loaded assembly, even if a different version is requested. 提供的部分組件名稱`assemblyRef`不建議使用。Supplying a partial assembly name for `assemblyRef` is not recommended. （部分的名稱會省略一或多個文化特性、 版本或公開金鑰語彙基元。(A partial name omits one or more of culture, version, or public key token. 採用而不是字串的多載物件，"MyAssembly，版本 = 1.0.0.0"舉例說明部分的名稱和"MyAssembly，version=1.0.0.0，Culture = neutral，PublicKeyToken = 18ab3442da84b47"是完整名稱的範例。)使用部分的名稱已對效能產生負面影響。For overloads that take a string instead of an object, "MyAssembly, Version=1.0.0.0" is an example of a partial name and "MyAssembly, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=18ab3442da84b47" is an example of a full name.) Using partial names has a negative effect on performance. 此外，部分組件名稱可以載入組件從全域組件快取才有的應用程式的基底目錄中的組件的完整複本 (或)。In addition, a partial assembly name can load an assembly from the global assembly cache only if there is an exact copy of the assembly in the application base directory ( or ). 如果目前物件表示應用程式定義域`A`，而方法從應用程式定義域呼叫`B`，組件會載入兩個應用程式定義域。If the current object represents application domain `A`, and the method is called from application domain `B`, the assembly is loaded into both application domains. 例如，下列程式碼載入`MyAssembly`至新的應用程式定義域`ChildDomain`也到應用程式定義域執行的程式碼：For example, the following code loads `MyAssembly` into the new application domain `ChildDomain` and also into the application domain where the code executes: [!code-cpp[System.AppDomain.Load#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.load/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.AppDomain.Load#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.load/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.AppDomain.Load#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.load/vb/source.vb#1)] 組件載入這兩個網域，因為不是衍生自，並因此傳回值的方法無法封送處理。The assembly is loaded into both domains because does not derive from , and therefore the return value of the method cannot be marshaled. 相反地，common language runtime 會嘗試載入至呼叫的應用程式定義域的組件。Instead, the common language runtime tries to load the assembly into the calling application domain. 載入至兩個應用程式定義域的組件可能是不同的兩個應用程式定義域的路徑設定是否不同。The assemblies that are loaded into the two application domains might be different if the path settings for the two application domains are different. > [!NOTE] > 如果兩個屬性和屬性所設定，第一次嘗試載入組件會使用顯示名稱 (包括版本、 文化特性，並依此類推，所傳回屬性)。If both the property and the property are set, the first attempt to load the assembly uses the display name (including version, culture, and so on, as returned by the property). 如果找不到檔案，屬性用來搜尋該組件。If the file is not found, the property is used to search for the assembly. 如果使用找到的組件，顯示名稱比對組件。If the assembly is found using , the display name is matched against the assembly. 如果比對失敗，就會擲回。If the match fails, a is thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 開頭為[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，使用這個方法載入的組件的信任層級是應用程式定義域的信任層級相同。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the trust level of an assembly that is loaded by using this method is the same as the trust level of the application domain. 這個方法應只將組件載入目前的應用程式定義域。This method should be used only to load an assembly into the current application domain. 為了方便起見提供這個方法的互通性的呼叫端無法呼叫靜態方法。This method is provided as a convenience for interoperability callers who cannot call the static method. 若要將其他應用程式定義域的組件載入，使用方法例如。To load assemblies into other application domains, use a method such as . 通用於所有多載，這個方法的資訊，請參閱方法多載。For information that is common to all overloads of this method, see the method overload. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何載入原始的組件的使用。The following sample demonstrates the use of loading a raw assembly. 若要執行此程式碼範例，您必須提供完整的組件名稱。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 如需如何取得完整組件名稱的資訊，請參閱[組件名稱](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否對目前處理程序啟用應用程式定義域的 CPU 和記憶體監視。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether CPU and memory monitoring of application domains is enabled for the current process.

summary.span: 一旦對處理程序啟用監視，就不能停用。

span.span: Once monitoring is enabled for a process, it cannot be disabled.

value.span: 如果啟用監視，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if monitoring is enabled; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這`static`屬性 (`Shared`屬性在 Visual Basic) 控制 CPU 和記憶體監視的程序中的所有應用程式定義域。This `static` property (`Shared` property in Visual Basic) controls CPU and memory monitoring of all the application domains in the process. 如果您嘗試將此屬性設定為`false`，則會擲回例外狀況，即使目前屬性的值是`false`。If you attempt to set this property to `false`, a exception is thrown, even if the current value of the property is `false`. 一旦啟用監視，您可以使用， ， ，和執行個體來監視個別的應用程式定義域的 CPU 和記憶體使用的屬性。Once monitoring is enabled, you can use the , , , and instance properties to monitor CPU and memory use of individual application domains.

exception.span: 目前的處理序嘗試要指派值 給這個屬性。

span.span: The current process attempted to assign the value to this property.

span.span: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此成員不能由部分信任或不透明的程式碼。

summary.span: 取得自上次回收作業後存留下來，且已知正由目前應用程式定義域參考之位元組的數目。

span.span: Gets the number of bytes that survived the last collection and that are known to be referenced by the current application domain.

value.span: 存留的位元組數目。

span.span: The number of surviving bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次記憶體回收會更新統計資料。The statistics are updated with each garbage collection. 不過，它們會保證完整、 阻斷式收集; 之後，才是正確的也就是的集合，其中包含所有層代和，以停止應用程式，這時集合就會發生。However, they are guaranteed to be accurate only after a full, blocking collection; that is, a collection that includes all generations and that stops the application while collection occurs. 比方說，方法多載會執行完整、 阻斷式收集。For example, the method overload performs a full, blocking collection. （並行集合會在背景進行的而且不會封鎖應用程式）。(Concurrent collection occurs in the background and does not block the application.)

span.span: Gets the total bytes that survived from the last collection for all application domains in the process.

value.span: 處理程序的存留位元組總數。

span.span: The total number of surviving bytes for the process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 完整、 阻斷式收集之後, 的位元組數目目前保留位於此數字代表 managed 堆積。After a full, blocking collection, this number represents the number of bytes currently held live on managed heaps. 它應該接近所報告的數字方法。It should be close to the number reported by the method. 暫時的集合之後, 此數字代表位元組數目目前保留要即時暫時層代中。After an ephemeral collection, this number represents the number of bytes currently held live in ephemeral generations.
