summary.span: 取得自處理程序啟動後，所有執行緒在目前應用程式定義域中執行時用掉的處理器時間總計。

span.span: Gets the total processor time that has been used by all threads while executing in the current application domain, since the process started.

value.span: 目前應用程式定義域的處理器時間總計。

span.span: Total processor time for the current application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 總時間所報告的應用程式定義域包含應用程式定義域中執行的處理序中的每個執行緒所花費的時間。The total time that is reported for an application domain includes the time each thread in the process spent executing in that application domain. 呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的執行緒仍會關聯應用程式定義域，並執行 unmanaged 程式碼會報告應用程式定義域進行呼叫所花費的處理器時間。A thread that calls into unmanaged code is still associated with an application domain, and the processor time spent executing the unmanaged code is reported for the application domain where the call was made. 當執行緒遭到封鎖或睡眠中，它不會佔用處理器時間。When a thread is blocked or sleeping, it does not consume processor time.

span.span: Gets the permission set of a sandboxed application domain.

value.span: 沙箱應用程式定義域的權限集。

span.span: The permission set of the sandboxed application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用所建立的沙箱應用程式定義域方法多載有一組同質性權限，也就是相同的權限集授與所有部分信任的組件載入應用程式定義域。Sandboxed application domains that were created by using the method overload have a homogenous set of permissions; that is, the same set of permissions is granted to all partially trusted assemblies that are loaded into the application domain. （選擇性） 沙箱應用程式定義域會有免套用此權限集，並改為使用完全信任執行的強式名稱組件清單。A sandboxed application domain optionally has a list of strong-named assemblies that are exempt from this permission set, and instead run with full trust.

span.span: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此成員不能由部分信任或不透明的程式碼。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

summary.span: 發生於預設應用程式定義域的父處理程序結束時。

span.span: Occurs when the default application domain's parent process exits.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 針對此事件可以執行終止活動，例如關閉檔案，釋出儲存體，在處理序結束之前。The for this event can perform termination activities, such as closing files, releasing storage and so on, before the process ends. 從.NET Framework 2.0 版開始，每個註冊的事件處理常式的應用程式定義域會引發這個事件。Beginning with the .NET Framework version 2.0, this event is raised in each application domain that registers an event handler. > [!NOTE] > 總執行時間的所有事件處理常式是受到限制，就如同所有的完成項執行時間總計會限制在關閉處理序。The total execution time of all event handlers is limited, just as the total execution time of all finalizers is limited at process shutdown. 預設值為兩秒。The default is two seconds. 受管理的主機可以呼叫來變更此執行階段[iclrpolicymanager:: Settimeout](~/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/hosting/iclrpolicymanager-settimeout-method.md)方法[OPR_ProcessExit](~/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/hosting/eclroperation-enumeration.md)列舉值。An unmanaged host can change this execution time by calling the [ICLRPolicyManager::SetTimeout](~/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/hosting/iclrpolicymanager-settimeout-method.md) method with the [OPR_ProcessExit](~/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/hosting/eclroperation-enumeration.md) enumeration value. 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，此事件是引發只在預設應用程式網域中，並且只有在預設應用程式定義域中註冊事件處理常式。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, this event is raised only in the default application domain, and only if an event handler is registered in the default application domain. 若要註冊此事件的事件處理常式，您必須擁有必要的權限，或就會擲回。To register an event handler for this event, you must have the required permissions, or a is thrown. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

summary.span: 發生於僅限反映之內容中的組件解析失敗時。

span.span: Occurs when the resolution of an assembly fails in the reflection-only context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在僅限反映的內容中，會不會自動解析相依性。In the reflection-only context, dependencies are not resolved automatically. 它們必須預先載入或傳回由這個事件處理常式。They must be preloaded or returned by the handler for this event. 當組件具有尚未載入至僅限反映內容的相依性時，會引發這個事件。This event is raised when an assembly has a dependency that is not already loaded into the reflection-only context. 遺失的相依性由屬性。The missing dependency is specified by the property. 本項目中必須傳回符合相依性的組件。The for this event must return an assembly that satisfies the dependency. 傳回組件必須載入僅限反映的內容。The assembly that is returned must be loaded into the reflection-only context. > [!IMPORTANT] > 僅針對遺失的相依性的組件載入僅限反映的內容會引發這個事件 (例如，藉由使用方法)。This event is raised only for missing dependencies of the assembly that you are loading into the reflection-only context (for example, by using the method). 如果找不到要載入的組件時，它不會引發。It is not raised if the assembly that you are loading cannot be found. 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，則屬性會傳回要求無法解析組件載入的組件。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the property returns the assembly that requested the assembly load that could not be resolved. 了解要求的組件的識別可能會有助於識別正確版本的相依性，如果一個以上的版本。Knowing the identity of the requesting assembly might be useful in identifying the correct version of the dependency, if more than one version is available. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 對於此事件，套用原則之前，屬性會傳回組件名稱。For this event, the property returns the assembly name before policy is applied. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

[!code-cpp[AppDomain.ReflectionOnlyGetAssemblies#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain.ReflectionOnlyGetAssemblies/CPP/reflectiononly.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AppDomain.ReflectionOnlyGetAssemblies#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain.ReflectionOnlyGetAssemblies/CS/reflectiononly.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppDomain.ReflectionOnlyGetAssemblies#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain.ReflectionOnlyGetAssemblies/VB/reflectiononly.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 私用組件會部署在相同的目錄結構與應用程式。Private assemblies are deployed in the same directory structure as the application. 如果所指定的路徑屬性不是下方，則會忽略它。If the path specified by the property is not under , it is ignored. 這個屬性會傳回設定使用的值。This property returns the value set using .

summary.span: 發生於資源的解析失敗時 (原因是因為該資源在組件中不是有效連結或內嵌的資源)。

span.span: Occurs when the resolution of a resource fails because the resource is not a valid linked or embedded resource in the assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 針對此事件可嘗試找出包含資源的組件，並將它傳回。The for this event can attempt to locate the assembly containing the resource and return it. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果解析失敗，因為針對有效的連結資源找不到檔案，不會引發此事件。This event is not raised if resolution fails because no file can be found for a valid linked resource. 如果找不到的資訊清單資源資料流，但如果找不到個別的資源索引鍵，則不會引發它，就會引發這個事件。It is raised if a manifest resource stream cannot be found, but it is not raised if an individual resource key cannot be found. 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，則屬性包含要求之資源的組件。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the property contains the assembly that requested the resource. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 若要註冊此事件的事件處理常式，您必須擁有必要的權限，或就會擲回。To register an event handler for this event, you must have the required permissions, or a is thrown. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

summary.span: 將指定值指派至指定的應用程式定義域屬性。

span.span: Assigns the specified value to the specified application domain property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法中插入項目，或修改的值描述屬性的這個執行個體的名稱資料組的內部快取中的項目。Use this method to insert an entry, or modify the value of an entry in an internal cache of name-data pairs that describe properties of this instance of . 快取會自動包含預先定義的系統建立應用程式定義域時，會插入的項目。The cache automatically contains predefined system entries that are inserted when the application domain is created. 您無法插入或修改系統項目使用此方法。You cannot insert or modify system entries with this method. 嘗試修改系統項目方法呼叫沒有任何作用中;此方法不會擲回例外狀況。A method call that attempts to modify a system entry has no effect; the method does not throw an exception. 您可以查看使用的系統項目的值方法或對等項目屬性中所述。You can inspect the values of system entries with the method, or the equivalent properties described in . 您可以呼叫這個方法，以評估供應"REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT 」 的規則運算式模式的預設逾時間隔的值設定的值`name`引數和值，表示在逾時值與間隔`data`引數。You can call this method to set the value of the default timeout interval for evaluating regular expression patterns by supply "REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT" as the value of the `name` argument and a value that represents the timeout interval as the value of the `data` argument. 您可以也插入或修改您自己的使用者定義名稱資料組使用這個方法並檢查其值與方法。You can also insert or modify your own user defined name-data pairs with this method and inspect their values with the method. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法用來建立新的值組。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to create a new value pair. 然後此範例使用方法來擷取值，並將它顯示到主控台。The example then uses the method to retrieve the value, and displays it to the console. [!code-cpp[ADGetData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADGetData/CPP/adgetdata.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ADGetData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADGetData/CS/adgetdata.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ADGetData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADGetData/VB/adgetdata.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法來插入或修改您的使用者定義的項目，在內部快取的名稱/資料組，可描述應用程式定義域的屬性。Use this method to insert or modify your own user-defined entries in an internal cache of name/data pairs that describe properties of the application domain. 當您將項目時，您可以指定的權限要求，以強制在擷取的項目時。颾魤 ㄛ 您可以呼叫這個方法，以評估供應"REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT 」 的規則運算式模式的預設逾時間隔的值設定的值`name`引數和值，表示做為值的逾時間隔`data`引數。When you insert an entry, you can specify a permission demand to enforce when the entry is retrieved.In addition, you can call this method to set the value of the default timeout interval for evaluating regular expression patterns by supply "REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT" as the value of the `name` argument and a value that represents the timeout interval as the value of the `data` argument. 您無法使用這個方法，將安全性需求的系統定義的屬性字串。You cannot use this method to assign a security demand to a system-defined property string. 快取會自動包含預先定義的系統建立應用程式定義域時，會插入的項目。The cache automatically contains predefined system entries that are inserted when the application domain is created. 您無法插入或修改系統項目使用此方法。You cannot insert or modify system entries with this method. 嘗試修改系統項目方法呼叫沒有任何作用中;此方法不會擲回例外狀況。A method call that attempts to modify a system entry has no effect; the method does not throw an exception. 您可以查看使用的系統項目的值方法或對等項目屬性，如 < 備註 > 一節所述方法。You can inspect the values of system entries with the method or the equivalent properties described in the Remarks section for the method.

span.span: Occurs when the resolution of a type fails.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Common language runtime 無法判斷組件可以建立要求的型別時，就會發生事件。The event occurs when the common language runtime is unable to determine the assembly that can create the requested type. 如果類型定義中的動態組件，或動態組件中未定義類型，但執行階段不知道哪個組件中定義型別，也可能會發生。This can occur if the type is defined in a dynamic assembly, or the type is not defined in a dynamic assembly but the runtime does not know which assembly the type is defined in. 後者的情況可能會發生時呼叫組件名稱未限定的型別名稱。The latter situation can occur when is called with a type name that is not qualified with the assembly name. 針對此事件可以嘗試找出並建立類型。The for this event can attempt to locate and create the type. 不過，事件不會發生執行階段可讓您知道不可能以尋找特定組件中的類型。However, the event does not occur if the runtime knows it is not possible to find a type in certain assemblies. 比方說，不會不會發生此事件的型別找不到靜態組件中因為執行階段知道類型無法以動態方式新增至靜態組件。For example, this event does not occur if the type is not found in a static assembly because the runtime knows types cannot be added dynamically to static assemblies. 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，則屬性包含要求的型別之組件。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the property contains the assembly that requested the type. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 若要註冊此事件的事件處理常式，您必須擁有必要的權限，或就會擲回。To register an event handler for this event, you must have the required permissions, or a is thrown. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例會示範事件。The following sample demonstrates the event. 若要執行此程式碼範例，您必須提供完整的組件名稱。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 如需如何取得完整組件名稱的資訊，請參閱[組件名稱](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). [!code-cpp[AppDomain_TypeResolve#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_TypeResolve/CPP/typeresolve.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AppDomain_TypeResolve#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_TypeResolve/CS/typeresolve.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppDomain_TypeResolve#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_TypeResolve/VB/typeresolve.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public event UnhandledExceptionEventHandler UnhandledException;
.event class System.UnhandledExceptionEventHandler UnhandledException
Public Custom Event UnhandledException As UnhandledExceptionEventHandler
public: virtual event UnhandledExceptionEventHandler ^ UnhandledException;
member this.UnhandledException : UnhandledExceptionEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於未攔截到例外狀況時。

span.span: Occurs when an exception is not caught.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件會通知無法攔截的例外狀況。This event provides notification of uncaught exceptions. 它可讓應用程式之前的系統預設處理常式回報給使用者的例外狀況，並終止應用程式記錄例外狀況的相關資訊。It allows the application to log information about the exception before the system default handler reports the exception to the user and terminates the application. 如果應用程式的狀態相關的足夠資訊可用，則可能會採取其他動作，例如儲存供稍後復原計畫資料。If sufficient information about the state of the application is available, other actions may be undertaken — such as saving program data for later recovery. 請謹慎，因為未處理例外狀況時，會損毀程式資料。Caution is advised, because program data can become corrupted when exceptions are not handled. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，應用程式終止偵錯選項報告和使用者會引發這個事件之前，而不是在後。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, application termination and debugging options are reported to the user before this event is raised, rather than after. 可以在任何應用程式定義域中處理這個事件。This event can be handled in any application domain. 不過，事件不一定會引發例外狀況的發生位置的應用程式定義域中。However, the event is not necessarily raised in the application domain where the exception occurred. 只有當執行緒在整個堆疊已回溯而未找到適用的例外狀況處理常式，因此可以引發事件的第一個位置是在執行緒的起源的應用程式定義域，是未處理例外狀況。An exception is unhandled only if the entire stack for the thread has been unwound without finding an applicable exception handler, so the first place the event can be raised is in the application domain where the thread originated. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，只會針對應用程式啟動時，會將由系統建立預設應用程式定義域發生此事件。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, this event occurs only for the default application domain that is created by the system when an application is started. 如果應用程式建立其他應用程式定義域，指定此事件的委派，這些應用程式網域中沒有任何作用。If an application creates additional application domains, specifying a delegate for this event in those applications domains has no effect. 如果預設應用程式定義域中處理事件，會引發這個事件發生的任何未處理例外狀況，在任何執行緒中，無論何種應用程式定義域中啟動的執行緒。If the event is handled in the default application domain, it is raised there for any unhandled exception in any thread, no matter what application domain the thread started in. 如果有事件處理常式的應用程式定義域中啟動執行緒，應用程式定義域中引發事件。If the thread started in an application domain that has an event handler for , the event is raised in that application domain. 如果該應用程式定義域不是預設的應用程式定義域，而且也沒有事件處理常式預設應用程式定義域中，會引發事件，這兩個應用程式定義域中。If that application domain is not the default application domain, and there is also an event handler in the default application domain, the event is raised in both application domains. 比方說，假設啟動執行緒應用程式定義域 」 AD1"，"AD2，"的應用程式定義域中呼叫的方法，並從中呼叫應用程式定義域 」 AD3 」，方法會擲回例外狀況。For example, suppose a thread starts in application domain "AD1", calls a method in application domain "AD2", and from there calls a method in application domain "AD3", where it throws an exception. 第一個應用程式定義域，可以引發事件是 「 AD1"。The first application domain in which the event can be raised is "AD1". 如果該應用程式定義域不是預設應用程式定義域，也是預設應用程式定義域中引發事件。If that application domain is not the default application domain, the event can also be raised in the default application domain. > [!NOTE] > Common language runtime 會暫止的執行緒中止時的事件處理常式執行事件。The common language runtime suspends thread aborts while event handlers for the event are executing. 如果事件處理常式屬性與適當的旗標，事件處理常式會被視為限制的執行區域。If the event handler has a attribute with the appropriate flags, the event handler is treated as a constrained execution region. 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，此事件不會引發例外狀況的損毀的程序的狀態，例如堆疊溢位，或存取違規，除非事件處理常式上為安全性關鍵，而且有屬性。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], this event is not raised for exceptions that corrupt the state of the process, such as stack overflows or access violations, unless the event handler is security-critical and has the attribute. 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，主應用程式執行緒以外的執行緒中發生未處理例外狀況會由執行階段會攔截，並因此不會造成應用程式終止。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, an unhandled exception that occurs in a thread other than the main application thread is caught by the runtime and therefore does not cause the application to terminate. 因此，就可能而不終止應用程式會引發事件。Thus, it is possible for the event to be raised without the application terminating. 從.NET Framework 2.0 版開始，這個子執行緒中的未處理例外狀況的支援已移除，因為這類的無訊息失敗的累積效果包含效能降低、 損毀的資料和鎖定，且很難偵錯。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, this backstop for unhandled exceptions in child threads was removed, because the cumulative effect of such silent failures included performance degradation, corrupted data, and lockups, all of which were difficult to debug. 如需詳細資訊，包括一份案例中，執行階段不會終止，請參閱[受控執行緒中的例外狀況](~/docs/standard/threading/exceptions-in-managed-threads.md)。For more information, including a list of cases in which the runtime does not terminate, see [Exceptions in Managed Threads](~/docs/standard/threading/exceptions-in-managed-threads.md). 若要註冊此事件的事件處理常式，您必須擁有必要的權限，或就會擲回。To register an event handler for this event, you must have the required permissions, or a is thrown. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## 未處理例外狀況的其他事件Other Events for Unhandled Exceptions 針對特定應用程式模型，事件可以清空的其他事件，如果主應用程式執行緒中發生未處理的例外狀況。For certain application models, the event can be preempted by other events if the unhandled exception occurs in the main application thread. 使用 Windows Forms 應用程式，在未處理的例外狀況中的主應用程式執行緒的原因會引發事件。In applications that use Windows Forms, unhandled exceptions in the main application thread cause the event to be raised. 如果處理此事件，預設行為是未處理的例外狀況不會終止應用程式，雖然應用程式處於未知狀態。If this event is handled, the default behavior is that the unhandled exception does not terminate the application, although the application is left in an unknown state. 在此情況下，不會引發事件。In that case, the event is not raised. 可以變更此行為，藉由使用應用程式組態檔，或是利用方法，以將模式變更為之前連結事件處理常式。This behavior can be changed by using the application configuration file, or by using the method to change the mode to before the event handler is hooked up. 只適用於主應用程式執行緒。This applies only to the main application thread. 其他執行緒中擲回未處理的例外狀況都會引發事件。The event is raised for unhandled exceptions thrown in other threads. 從 Microsoft Visual Studio 2005 開始，Visual Basic 應用程式架構可以提供另一個事件在主應用程式執行緒的未處理例外狀況。Starting with Microsoft Visual Studio 2005, the Visual Basic application framework provides another event for unhandled exceptions in the main application thread. 請參閱事件。See the event. 此事件具有與所使用的事件引數物件的名稱相同的事件引數物件，但具有不同的屬性。This event has an event arguments object with the same name as the event arguments object used by , but with different properties. 這個事件引數物件的有特別的是，屬性，可讓應用程式繼續執行，而忽略未處理的例外狀況 （並讓應用程式處於未知狀態）。In particular, this event arguments object has an property that allows the application to continue running, ignoring the unhandled exception (and leaving the application in an unknown state). 在此情況下，不會引發事件。In that case, the event is not raised. ## Examples 如以下範例將示範事件。The followingexample demonstrates the event. 它會定義事件處理常式， `MyHandler`，叫用時的預設應用程式定義域中擲回未處理的例外狀況。It defines an event handler, `MyHandler`, that is invoked whenever an unhandled exception is thrown in the default application domain. 然後，會擲回兩個例外狀況。It then throws two exceptions. 第一個由**try/catch**區塊。The first is handled by a **try/catch** block. 第二個是未處理，並叫用`MyHandle`應用程式終止之前的常式。The second is unhandled and invokes the `MyHandle` routine before the application terminates. [!code-cpp[AppDomain_UnhandledException#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_UnhandledException/CPP/unhandledexception.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AppDomain_UnhandledException#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_UnhandledException/CS/unhandledexception.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppDomain_UnhandledException#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_UnhandledException/VB/unhandledexception.vb#1)]

param.name: domain
param.span: 要卸載的應用程式定義域。

span.span: An application domain to unload.

summary.span: 卸載指定的應用程式定義域。

span.span: Unloads the specified application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 2.0 版中已有執行緒專門用來卸載應用程式定義域。In the .NET Framework version 2.0 there is a thread dedicated to unloading application domains. 這可改善可靠性，尤其是當裝載.NET Framework。This improves reliability, especially when the .NET Framework is hosted. 當執行緒呼叫，目標網域已標示為卸載。When a thread calls , the target domain is marked for unloading. 專用的執行緒嘗試卸載定義域，並在網域中的所有執行緒都被都中止。The dedicated thread attempts to unload the domain, and all threads in the domain are aborted. 如果執行緒不會中止，例如因為它正在執行 unmanaged 程式碼，或因為它執行`finally`區塊，然後在一段時間後的初次呼叫的執行緒中擲回。If a thread does not abort, for example because it is executing unmanaged code, or because it is executing a `finally` block, then after a period of time a is thrown in the thread that originally called . 如果無法最終中止的執行緒結束時，目標網域不卸載。If the thread that could not be aborted eventually ends, the target domain is not unloaded. 因此，在.NET Framework 2.0 版`domain`不保證會卸除，因為它可能無法終止正在執行的執行緒。Thus, in the .NET Framework version 2.0 `domain` is not guaranteed to unload, because it might not be possible to terminate executing threads. > [!NOTE] > 在某些情況下，呼叫會導致立即，例如在完成項呼叫。In some cases, calling causes an immediate , for example if it is called in a finalizer. 中的執行緒`domain`使用終止方法，就會擲回執行緒中。The threads in `domain` are terminated using the method, which throws a in the thread. 不過，應該立即終止執行緒，它會繼續執行無法預期的一段時間中`finally`子句。Although the thread should terminate promptly, it can continue executing for an unpredictable amount of time in a `finally` clause. ## 版本相容性Version Compatibility 在.NET Framework 1.0 和 1.1，如果呼叫執行緒正在執行`domain`，另一個執行緒已啟動執行卸載作業。In the .NET Framework version 1.0 and 1.1 if the thread that calls is running in `domain`, another thread is started to perform the unload operation. 如果`domain`不能卸載該執行緒不在原始呼叫的執行緒中擲回。If `domain` cannot be unloaded, a is thrown in that thread, not in the original thread that called . 不過，如果執行緒呼叫外部執行`domain`，執行緒會收到例外狀況。However, if the thread that calls is running outside `domain`, that thread receives the exception. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何卸載應用程式定義域。The following code example shows how to unload an application domain. [!code-cpp[ADUnload#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADUnload/CPP/adunload.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ADUnload#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADUnload/CS/adunload.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ADUnload#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADUnload/VB/adunload.vb#1)]
